## Now write the following code

Write this out inside the "code chunk" in your notes.

```{r}
#| label: "codefig-first-plot"
#| message: FALSE
#| fig.show: "hide"
#| fig.width: 5.8
#| fig.height: 5.5
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)

p <- ggplot(data = gapminder, 
            mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap, 
                          y = lifeExp))  


p + geom_point()
```

... And knit your document again.

## Now write the following code

Write this out inside the "code chunk" in your notes.

```{r}

#| fig.height: 5.5
#| output-location: column
library(tidyverse)

p <- ggplot(data = gapminder, 
            mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap, 
                          y = lifeExp))  


p + geom_point()
```
